Package runner

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GUI
    A class to manage all MVC systems and display them to screen.
    Screen
    A class to warp an MVC system.
    ScreenCreator<ModelClass extends java.lang.Class<? extends Model>,ViewClass extends java.lang.Class<? extends View>,ControllerClass extends java.lang.Class<? extends Controller>>
    This class encapsulates a model, view, and controller
    ScreenFinder
    A class to find screens annotated with @MVC
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateScreenException
    This exception is called when two Models, two Views, or two Controllers have the same @MVC() annotation.
    ScreenMissingPartsException
    An exception if a screen does not have all of its parts.
